name: the apocalypse, but make it fashion. ✨

content.html: I want to make something very clear about the whole “no cops at SF Pride” thing: It (sadly) isn’t even a ban on cops. It was a request that, if they attend, they not do so in clothing with the literal blood of our community on it. That was it. That’s what the tantrum is about.
content.value:
I want to make something very clear about the whole “no cops at SF Pride” thing:

It (sadly) isn’t even a ban on cops. It was a request that, if they attend, they not do so in clothing with the literal blood of our community on it.

That was it. That’s what the tantrum is about.
